array.string: export CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE=/opt/Quarantine CLAMDSCAN_LOG=/opt/local/var/log/clamav/clamdscan.log ; /opt/local/bin/clamdscan --reload && ( /bin/test -d $CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE || /bin/mkdir -p $CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE ) && ( /bin/test -d $CLAMDSCAN_LOG || /bin/mkdir -p $CLAMDSCAN_LOG ) && echo "Launch daemon org.macports.clamdscan started on `date` â€¦" >> $CLAMDSCAN_LOG && /usr/bin/nice -n 15 /opt/local/bin/clamdscan --multiscan --quiet --fdpass --move=$CLAMDSCAN_QUARANTINE --log=$CLAMDSCAN_LOG '/' && echo "Launch daemon org.macports.clamdscan completed on `date`." >> $CLAMDSCAN_LOG || echo "Launch daemon org.macports.clamdscan exited with error code $? on `date`." >> $CLAMDSCAN_LOG
